content.raw:
Maybe it's best not to print this here, because the path may be changed later and the final path will be printed anyway. For example, I'm getting this:

~~~
[Msg] Ignition Gazebo        v1.1.0
[Msg] Ignition Gazebo Server v1.1.0
[Msg] Recording states to /tmp/lalala
(...)
[Wrn] [LogRecord.cc:198] Log path already exists on disk! Recording instead to [/tmp/lalala(6)]
[Msg] Saved initial SDF file to [/tmp/lalala(6)/state.sdf]
[Msg] Recording to log file [/tmp/lalala(6)/state.tlog]
~~~
